content.description: Directions: Select the choice that best fits each statement. The following questions(s) refer to the lettered points of the curves plotted on the graph below. The curves show two possible patterns of change in population size over time for a certain species of small mammal in an ecosystem.
content.question: Population decreasing at greatest rate

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain relationships between different characteristics of environmental concepts, processes, or models represented visually. a. In theoretical contexts. b. In applied contexts.
